<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 7+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Wand of the Spider](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3430)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
<trait label="Poison" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=669" />
<trait label="Wand" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=731" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 309 <sup>1.1</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The length of this wand is a pair of twisted giant spider legs.

**Activate** <actions string="" /> Cast a Spell;  **Frequency** once per day, plus overcharge;   **Effect** You cast [_web_](/Spells.aspx?ID=2045), but the strands of webbing are toxic. Any creature that fails its Athletics check or Reflex save to navigate the web takes 1d6 poison damage.

**Craft Requirements** Supply a casting of [_web_](/Spells.aspx?ID=374) of the appropriate rank.
